languages.text: "Довольно, {name}. Ересью это станет, только если я проиграю. А если возьму верх — это будет триумф и подвиг во имя спасения Человечества от ужасов вселенной. И я не проиграю".
"Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."
languages.original_text: "Довольно, {name}. Ересью это станет, только если я проиграю. А если возьму верх — это будет триумф и подвиг во имя спасения Человечества от ужасов вселенной. И я не проиграю".

traits.locale_text: Enough, {name}. It will be heresy only if I lose. And if I win, then it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving the Humanity from the cosmic horrors. And I will not lose."
Enough, {name}. It will be heresy only if I lose. And if I win, then it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving the Humanity from the cosmic horrors. And I will not lose."
Enough, {name}. It will be heresy only if I lose. And if I win, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving the Humanity from the cosmic horrors. There's no way I'm losing."
Enough, {name}. It will be heresy only if I lose. And if I win, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving the Humanity from the cosmic horrors. There's no way I'm losing."
"Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."
"Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."

languages.text: « Assez, {name}. Ce sera de l'hérésie seulement si je perds. Si je triomphe, cependant, ce sera un exploit triomphal accompli pour sauver l'humanité des horreurs de cet univers. Et je n'ai pas l'intention de perdre. »
languages.original_text: "Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."

traits.locale_text: « Pas de ça, {name}. Ce sera de l'hérésie seulement si je perds. Mais si je triomphe, ce sera un exploit triomphal accompli pour sauver l'humanité des horreurs de cet univers. Et je n'ai pas l'intention de perdre. »

languages.text: «Ya basta, {name}. Solo será herejía si pierdo. Si triunfo, será una gesta en nombre de la salvación de la Humanidad frente a los horrores del universo. Y no pienso perder».
languages.original_text: "Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."

traits.locale_text: «Basta, {name}. Solo será herejía si pierdo. Si gano, será una proeza triunfal en pos de salvar a la Humanidad de los horrores cósmicos. Y no pienso perder».

languages.text: “够了，{name}。如果我输了，这确实算是异端邪说。可如果我赢了，这会是场胜利的壮举，从宇宙的恐怖之中拯救了人类。而我，我绝不会输。”
languages.original_text: "Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."

traits.locale_text: “够了，{name}。如果我输了，这确实算是异端邪说。可如果我赢了，这会是场胜利的壮举，是从宇宙的恐怖之物手中拯救人类的壮举。而我，我是不可能输的。”

languages.text: "Genug, {name}. Es ist nur Ketzerei, wenn ich verliere. Und wenn ich gewinne, ist es eine triumphale Heldentat, um die Menschheit vor den Grauen dieses Universums zu retten. Und ich werde nicht verlieren."
languages.original_text: "Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."

traits.locale_text: Genug, {name}. Ketzerei ist es nur, wenn ich verliere. Und wenn ich gewinne, ist es eine triumphale Heldentat, um die Menschheit vor den Grauen des Kosmos zu retten. Ich werde auf keinen Fall verlieren."

languages.text: 「もういい、{name}。私が敗れれば異端となる。もし私が勝てば、宇宙の恐怖から人類を救うという題目をもって、勝利の偉業となるだろう。そして、私が負けることはない」
languages.original_text: "Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."

traits.locale_text: 「もういい、{name}。私が敗れれば異端となる。もし私が勝てば、宇宙の恐怖から人類を救うという題目をもって、勝利の偉業となるだろう。そして、私が負けることはない」

languages.text: "Yeter {name}. Sadece kaybedersem kâfirlik olur. Başarılı olursam İnsanlığı bu evrenin dehşetinden kurtarmak adına büyük bir adım atmış olacağım. Başarısız olmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Enough, {name}. It will only be heresy if I lose. If I prevail, it will be a triumphant feat in the name of saving Humanity from the horrors of this universe. And I will not lose."
